basics.name: Alec Rust
basics.label: Frontend Developer
basics.summary: Experienced frontend developer with a passion for accessibility, performance, SEO and meticulously crafted mobile-first user interfaces. 13 years web development experience, 9 of which in London working for large corporations and startups.

work.summary: Currently working to deliver the new BBC Three website with React/Node for when the channel is taken off air.
Led the frontend development of the social shopping platform built on Ruby/Rails, joining the founding team and staying with the company as it grew to 20+ employees.
Developed the frontend for the social shopping marketplace MVP.
Developed artist and label websites as well as launching the new classical music online magazine Sinfini Music.
Worked alongside the BBC.com development team to deliver the BBC website to international users.
Maintained the BBC "passion sites" including BBC Good Food, Gardeners' World and Radio Times, and rebuilt the Top Gear website.
Worked with BBC Public Service delivering a customisable BBC homepage for domestic users.
Assisted small businesses and startups get off the ground with a basic web presence or frontend for their idea.
Developed websites and emails for RAPP's clients including Apple, Disney, Unicef, Pfizer and Barclays.
